item.title: ‘On the Sea’ Review: A Stirring, Windblown Romance Between Two Lonely Mussel-Men in Coastal Wales
item.description: The instantly immortal Rihanna lyric “We found love in a hopeless place” comes to mind more than once in “On the Sea,” and perhaps unfairly so. The severe, slate-skied stretch
